content.question: Your response should include the following: Provides an appropriate, explicitly stated thesis that directly addresses all parts of the question and does NOT simply restate the question. Discusses a majority of the documents individually and specifically. Demonstrates understanding of the basic meaning of a majority of the documents. Supports the thesis with appropriate interpretations of a majority of the documents. Analyzes the documents by explicitly grouping them in at least three appropriate ways. Takes into account both the sources of the documents and the authors’ points of view. Analyze attitudes toward and evaluate the motivations behind the European acquisition of African colonies in the period 1880 to 1914.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
